channel.title: Adding edited sprites
channel.description: Ok, so when you finish adding a image and packing it to a sprite is the image number the same as the sprite number, like if your making a sprite called 1330 and u pack it would you rename it to 1330.spr? and what would you do next? add it in items.rscd itemdef and itemweildable def?
